ToggleSteering.description: Enable or disable the steering with this key.

Lane change to the left.description:
Bind this if you dont want to use the indicators
to change lanes with the NavigationDetection.
Lane change to the left.notBoundInfo:
Bind this if you dont want to use the indicators
to change lanes with the NavigationDetection.

Lane change to the right.description:
Bind this if you dont want to use the indicators
to change lanes with the NavigationDetection.
Lane change to the right.notBoundInfo:
Bind this if you dont want to use the indicators
to change lanes with the NavigationDetection.
